text.text: Barbecue-flavored <shaped_chips>, spicy, sweet and tangy, taste of paprika and garlic.
Sour cream and onion-flavored <shaped_chips>, sour and tangy, the onion flavor is subtle.
Sour cream and cheddar-flavored <shaped_chips>, sour and tangy, the cheddar comes through surprisingly well.
Salt and vinegar-flavored <shaped_chips>, the vinegar brings a surprisingly nice, acidic taste.
Paprika-flavored <shaped_chips>, a classic snack to pair with a bottle of 'Spezi'.
'All-dressed' <shaped_chips>, a uniquely Canadian combination of ketchup, BBQ, sour cream & onion, and salt & vinegar flavors.  Better than it sounds.
Salsa-flavored <shaped_chips>, mildly spicy, with a blend of tomatoes, peppers and onions.
Ketchup-flavored <shaped_chips>, tangy with a salty punch.  A Canadian classic.
Neither prawn nor cocktail, these tangy tomato, mayo and condiment flavored <shaped_chips> taste like nothing you'd eat in food form.
Sriracha-flavored <shaped_chips>, tangy and sweet, with a lingering heat.
Yoghurt and herbs-flavored <shaped_chips> with a creamy taste and fresh notes of dill and parsley.
Aspic and horseradish-flavored <shaped_chips>, meaty with a pungent horseradish taste.
Dill and pickle-flavored <shaped_chips>, sour with a crisp vinegar bite, very divisive.
Chili-flavored <shaped_chips>, spicy, sweet and smoky, tasting of pepper and cumin.
